metadata.description: Yoshiki Tanaka, who is well-known as the writer of Legend of the Galactic Heroes, is one of the most famous writers in Japan. His new comic is Prince of Lanling. The Prince of Lanling, the main character, is good-looking enough to attract companions and even their enemies. The super popular hero is always wearing a mask when he has a battle. He'll show us a dramatic twist, a tragedy, and a complicated way of life. It's a history action adventure manga based in China.
metadata.name: Prince of Lan Ling
